sledgehammer.lua.core

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • sledgehammer.util.Printable
      • sledgehammer.lua.LuaObject
        • sledgehammer.lua.LuaTable
          • sledgehammer.lua.MongoLuaObject<MongoPlayer>
            • sledgehammer.lua.core.Player

  • public class Player
extends MongoLuaObject<MongoPlayer>
    MongoLuaObject to store player data and handle player operations and utilities for the Sledgehammer engine.
    Author:
    Jab

      • Player

        public Player(java.lang.String username)
        Constructor for arbitrarily defining with only a player name. The constructor attempts to locate the UdpConnection instance, and the IsoPlayer instance, using the user-name given.
        Parameters:
        username - The String username of the Player.

      • sendChatMessage

        public void sendChatMessage(ChatMessage message)
        Sends a given ChatMessage to the Player on the ChatChannel defined.

        If a ChatChannel's Id is not defined in the ChatMessage, an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.

        If a ChatChanel is not found with the defined Id in the ChatMessage, an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.

        Parameters:
        message - The ChatMessage being sent to the Player.

      • sendChatMessageToAllChatChannels

        public void sendChatMessageToAllChatChannels(ChatMessage chatMessage)
        Sends a given ChatMessage to the PLayer in all available ChatChannels.
        Parameters:
        chatMessage - The ChatMessage to send.

      • sendChatMessage

        public void sendChatMessage(java.lang.String message)
        Sends a ChatMessage with provided String content to the Player.
        Parameters:
        message - The String message content to send.

      • sendChatMessages

        public void sendChatMessages(java.lang.String[] lines)
        Sends ChatMessages to a Player, with a given String Array of lines.
        Parameters:
        lines - The String Array of messages to send.

      • isWithinLocalRange

        public boolean isWithinLocalRange(Player other)
        Parameters:
        other - The Player to measure.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the Player is less than or equal to the defined range in the PZ server for local chat.

      • isOnline

        public boolean isOnline()
        Returns:
        Returns true if the Player is currently on the server.

      • hasPermission

        public boolean hasPermission(java.lang.String node,
                             boolean ignoreAdmin)
        Parameters:
        node - The String node that is being tested.
        ignoreAdmin - Boolean flag for ignoring Administrator check.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the Player is granted the given String node permission. If the Player is an administrator and the ignoreAdmin flag is set to false, this method will always return true. To grab the raw permission, use 'hasRawPermission(String node)...'.

      • hasPermission

        public boolean hasPermission(java.lang.String node)
        Parameters:
        node - The String node that is being tested.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the Player is granted the given String node permission. If the Player is an administrator, this method will always return true. To grab the raw permission, use 'hasRawPermission(String node)...'.

      • setPermission

        public void setPermission(java.lang.String node,
                          boolean flag)
        Sets a String permission-node for a Player with the explicitly-defined Boolean flag.
        Parameters:
        node - The String permission-node to set.
        flag - The Boolean flag to set.

      • isUsername

        public boolean isUsername(java.lang.String username)
        Parameters:
        username - The String user-name to test. (Non-Case-Sensitive)
        Returns:
        Returns true if the given String user-name matches the one for the Player.

        Parameters:
        usernameFragment - The String user-name to test. (Non-Case-Sensitive)
        Returns:
        Returns true if the String user-name of the Player contains the String user-name fragment given.

      • isNickname

        public boolean isNickname(java.lang.String nickname)
        Parameters:
        nickname - The String nickname to test. (Non-Case-Sensitive)
        Returns:
        Returns true if the given String nickname matches the one for the Player.

      • isNicknameDirty

        public boolean isNicknameDirty(java.lang.String nicknameFragment)
        Parameters:
        nicknameFragment - The String nickname fragment to test. (Non-Case-Sensitive)
        Returns:
        Returns true if the String nickname of the Player contains the String nickname fragment given.

      • isName

        public boolean isName(java.lang.String name)
        Parameters:
        name - The String user-name or nickname to test. (Non-Case Sensitive)
        Returns:
        Returns true if the given String user-name or nickname matches the one for the Player. The String user-name is checked first. The String nickname is checked second.

      • isNameDirty

        public boolean isNameDirty(java.lang.String nameFragment)
        Parameters:
        nameFragment - The String user-name or nickname fragment to test. (Non-Case-Sensitive)
        Returns:
        Returns true if the String user-name or String nick-name of the Player contains the String name fragment given. The user-name is checked first. The nickname is checked second. strict comparisons are checked before dirty comparisons.

      • isAdministrator

        public boolean isAdministrator()
        Returns:
        Returns true if the Player is flagged as an Administrator with full privileges.

      • setProperty

        public java.lang.String setProperty(java.lang.String property,
                                    java.lang.String content)
        Sets a given meta-data String property value with a String key to identify. This change is automatically saved to the MongoDB database.
        Parameters:
        property - The String key to identify.
        content - The String value to set.
        Returns:
        Returns the old String property value if this operation replaces a previous value.

        Sets a given meta-data String property value with a String key to identify.
        Parameters:
        property - The String key to identify.
        content - The String value to set.
        save - Flag to save the MongoDocument after applying the changes.
        Returns:
        Returns the old String property value if this operation replaces a previous value.

        public java.util.UUID getUniqueId()

      • findConnection

        public static zombie.core.raknet.UdpConnection findConnection(java.lang.String username)
        Parameters:
        username - The String user-name to identify the UdpConnection.
        Returns:
        Returns a UdpConnection with the given String user-name. If no UdpConnection uses the given String user-name, null is returned.
